entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@RepLeeZeldin @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse No one has ever Had a great meeting w/ @realDonaldTrump by the very nature of his idiot presence! Trump’s FAILED response to COVID-19 is killing people!
I’m ashamed of the pathetic efforts & terrible results of the #failedPresident & his incompetent team. They do not WORK!
